title: The endocrine disruptor effect of metal nanoparticles mainly depends on their capacity to release metal ions.

Throughout their lives, humans are constantly exposed to various pollutants that can affect our development and physiology. The growing list of pollutants include drugs, pesticides, cosmetics, plasticizers, and other organic...
